metadata.name: Melody of Unity #1/10
metadata.description: In this whimsical painting, a girl sits atop a pink horse, playing a flute that creates a magical energy in the air around her. The horse stands in a gold pond, drinking from the water while a man nearby pours magical orbs into the pond. The overall effect is one of harmony and unity, with each character contributing their own unique talents to create something magical and beautiful.
